pullRequest.title: CB-5099: FreeIPA changes to support AWS instance recovery
pullRequest.bodyText:
This change adds an automatic cloudwatch alarm during
the instance creation for AWS and removes it during
termination. This is only necessary for AWS as Azure
enables this by default. This enables an instance to
automatically recover when the underlying hardware,
owned by AWS, is faulty.
This was tested manually and verified that only FreeIPA instances receive the cloudwatch alarm.

nodes.bodyText: could you drop this field in favor of adding only an entry to the parameter map? As it is very spi specific I think we should not include this as a field in CloudStack

could you move cloudwatch related code/methods to a separate component?
that way it would be easier to write some simple unit test for it also. maybe the condition could be moved there, so you can cover all the pieces of the logic related to it
